title: PM commends security forces for foiling attack in North Waziristan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 17 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Friday commended the officers and personnel of the security forces for thwarting the attack of Fitna al-Khawarij in Mir Ali area of North Waziristan.
In a statement, he praised the professional skills of the officers and personnel of the security forces for killing six Khawarij.
He said Pakistan will continue to fight terrorism until it was completely eradicated.
“We will continue to destroy the evil intentions of the Fitna al-Khawarij and their supporters regarding Pakistan,” he added.
The Prime Minister said, “The entire nation, including me, stands by the unwavering resolve of the Pakistan armed forces to defend the homeland.”
